# Pre-feasibility design study for a proposed EAF/LMF/VD station for steel decarbonization studies

## Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** CB-249-78163734
**Solicitation Number:** 5000078538
**Publication Date:** January 19, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 27, 2024, 14:00:00

**Contract Overview:**

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) seeks proposals from bidders to conduct a pre-feasibility design study for a proposed Electric Arc Furnace/Ladle Furnace/Vacuum Degasser (EAF/LMF/VD) station for steel decarbonization studies.

**Objectives:**

- Conduct a pre-feasibility design study for a proposed EAF/LMF/VD station suitable for steel decarbonization studies.
- Evaluate the technical and financial viability of implementing this technology.

**Offer Requirements:**

- The offer must include a comprehensive pre-feasibility design study report that summarizes the results of the evaluation.
- The report should be presented in a clear and concise manner and include relevant data and information.
- The offer must also provide a detailed description of the methodology used to conduct the study.

**Technical Evaluation Criteria:**

- The proposal should demonstrate expertise in conducting pre-feasibility design studies.
- The proposal should clearly outline the methodology used to conduct the study.
- The proposal should provide a comprehensive analysis of the technical and financial feasibility of the proposed EAF/LMF/VD station.

**Language:**

- Bids will be accepted in either English or French.

**Commercial Evaluation Criteria:**

- Price

**Trade Agreements:**

- The bid is subject to the following trade agreements:
  - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Additional Information:**

- All bidders must register on the Canada Bid website to access the documentation package.
- The bidder contact is Roya Ayam, whose contact information is provided below.
